div.p: This code system http://tecnomod-um.org/CodeSystem/brain-imaging-type-cs defines the following codes:

tr.td: Computed Tomography (CT), CT Angiography (CTA), and CT Perfusion
Magnetic Resonance Imaging (MRI) with Diffusion-Weighted Imaging (DWI) or Fluid-Attenuated Inversion Recovery (FLAIR)
Magnetic Resonance Imaging (MRI) with Diffusion-Weighted Imaging (DWI) or Fluid-Attenuated Inversion Recovery (FLAIR), and Magnetic Resonance Angiography (MRA)
Magnetic Resonance Imaging (MRI) with Diffusion-Weighted Imaging (DWI) and Fluid-Attenuated Inversion Recovery (FLAIR), Magnetic Resonance Angiography (MRA), and MR Perfusion

description.value: Codes specifying the type of brain imaging performed (e.g., CT, MRI).

definition.value: Computed Tomography (CT), CT Angiography (CTA), and CT Perfusion
Magnetic Resonance Imaging (MRI) with Diffusion-Weighted Imaging (DWI) or Fluid-Attenuated Inversion Recovery (FLAIR)
Magnetic Resonance Imaging (MRI) with Diffusion-Weighted Imaging (DWI) or Fluid-Attenuated Inversion Recovery (FLAIR), and Magnetic Resonance Angiography (MRA)
Magnetic Resonance Imaging (MRI) with Diffusion-Weighted Imaging (DWI) and Fluid-Attenuated Inversion Recovery (FLAIR), Magnetic Resonance Angiography (MRA), and MR Perfusion
